oai_dc:dc.dc:title: P. B. Newman correspondence
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to P. B. Newman, Co. G, 43rd Tenn. Inf., CSA, from H. A. Newman, Co. G, 43rd Tenn. Inf., CSA. H. A. Newman states that he has enclosed an affidavit as P. B. Newman requested. He mentions that he has inserted a blank he wants P. B. to fill out for; him. A second letter, dated June 11, 1904, bearing the same sentiments is included. P. B. Newman was born in Jefferson County, Tenn., in 1843. He married Elizabeth Wilson in McMinn County on November 7, 1872. He died on March 7, 1908.
